name: Summary
description: Experienced web designer with over 2+ years of hands-on expertise in crafting visually appealing and user-friendly websites. Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and various design tools, consistently delivering high-quality digital products. Additionally, possess 1+ years of dedicated experience as a React developer, adept at building interactive and dynamic front-end applications. Skilled in collaborating with cross-functional teams, interpreting client requirements, and implementing innovative solutions. Demonstrated ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery and exceeding client expectations. Committed to staying updated with the latest design trends and technologies to deliver cutting-edge solutions.
